attributes.action: Sadiq Khan steps down as Mayor of London.
attributes.background:
Sadiq Khan. Is trying to set up a referendum to sepearate London from the rest of England. London is the capital of England. We will not be seperated. 
He should step down for trying to devide England. No confidence in England.

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is accountable to the London assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament.
